title: Family and friends mourn Amir Locke at Minneapolis funeral after he was killed by police executing a no-knock warrant - CNN
content:
1. Family and friends mourn Amir Locke at Minneapolis funeral after he was killed by police executing a no-knock warrant  CNN
  2. Amir Locke's funeral: Mom says son was 'executed,' Sharpton delivers powerful eulogy  ABC News
  3. Funeral For Amir Locke To Be Held Amid Moratorium On No-Knock Warrants  NBC News
  4. Mourners hear words of reassurance, a mother's fury during Amir Locke's funeral in Minneapolis  Minneapolis Star Tribune
  5. Amir Locke Grieved, Mark Hanneman's History Comes Into Focus Before Funeral in Minneapolis Police Killing  Daily Beast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Members of the Minneapolis community gathered Thursday to honor the life of Amir Locke, a 22-year-old Black man whose killing at the hands of police during the execution of a no-knock warrant has reignited debate around the controversial practice.
